title: Massive win streaks then massive loss streaks, what's it all about?
body:
My overall gameplay is the same, but I seem to get win streaks of 10+ more games then have a loss streak of the same, I get the wins because I have a decent team, then a streak of AFKs and feeders.

Is this just a coincidence? because it's happening over and over again, up to top of B1 on a win streak then back down to BV on a loss streak. I would understand if I had a mix and match each game but it's not like that.

Is there more going on here?

replies.body:
I think most of us have had something like this happen before. 

For me though it's never the case that

>My overall gameplay is the same

I'm generally playing just that little bit worse but won't stop until I get one win. I convince myself that I'm good to keep going and before you know it my ratin' is all gone.

If you win a lot of games in a row, generally you can be put up against people who are relatively better then you and because your mmr doesn't fall as fast as your lp, your up against those same level of people for a fair while. (e.g. this season i started bronze 3 and quickly rushed up to gold 5, but due to this my mmr was to high for my current ability, i mean they felt the same, but the people i was versing were generally smarter and it kind of put me on a higher loss than win steak for a bit until it evened out). 

Tl;dr more games you win the more skilled player you verse, but when you lose, you still play against those players for a bit.

Yes same exact thing happened to me. Managed to climb to bronze 1 and now i'm in bronze 5 again. At first I thought it was because school holidays started and I was playing with a bunch of kids but after doing some research it seems Riot purposely tries to keep players at a 50% or lower win rate. I'm not sure how people end up in Diamond with 50% win rates but viewing player profiles from different divisions this seems to be the truth.

If anyone has a strategy to circumvent this I'd love to hear it.

Seems awfully coincidental that 50% of my games I can carry fairly average players and 50% of the time they are afk/non stop arguing/flaming/not even trying/feeding intentionally etc etc

Yes i have experienced this same issue. I have analysed the matches players and all. I have determined that the only reasonable explanation for such occurrences is that riot is punishing you for massive improvement by matching you with teams of lower mmr than your opponents. Riot is not transparent with the workings of the game and i believe that this is a bug that tries to halt your progress in the hope that by matching you with worse teammates will place you in the tier you belong.

Riot will not respond to this problem.
Or maybe there are other problems to deal with like specific champion balance issues that affect normal and bot mode players too?

I had the same thing climbing from bronze 3 to silver 3. Then I went on losing streak and went from silver four to five to four to five. Now I am in five and I win two games then lose two. Then win two. So I am just in the same place.
its luck you can get a afk or a player with 10/10 internet
I've been getting the same, huge win streaks then huge losing ones, I can't figure out why.
